main_text: Hi, I'm a frontend developer from Lucerne, Switzerland. With my passion for modern web technologies, I develop appealing and intuitive web applications.
point_one: I am flexible in terms of where I work and I also enjoy working remotely. Whether in the office or remotely, I am committed to completing projects successfully.
point_three: For me, web development is more than a job - it's my passion. I enjoy turning ideas into functional and aesthetic applications that offer real added value.
point_two: I love taking on new challenges and am always curious about new technologies. I am constantly learning to expand my knowledge and stay up to date.
